g4p_controls

Class GViewPeasyCam

  • java.lang.Object
    • g4p_controls.GAbstractControl
      • g4p_controls.GAbstractView
        • g4p_controls.GViewPeasyCam
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GConstants, processing.core.PConstants

    public class GViewPeasyCam
extends GAbstractView
    A GViewPeasyCam control is a 3D view controlled by a PeasyCam object.
    There are some limitations
    • Only mouse ENTERED, EXITED and CLICKED events will be reported to listeners.
    • You cannot rotate this control
    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Constructor Detail

      • GViewPeasyCam

        public GViewPeasyCam(processing.core.PApplet theApplet,
                     float p0,
                     float p1,
                     float p2,
                     float p3,
                     float dist)
        Create a 3D view object controlled with PeasyCam on the main sketch surface.
        The camera will look at the default [0,0,0] position
        Parameters:
        theApplet - the main sketch
        p0 - x position based on control mode
        p1 - y position based on control mode
        p2 - x position or width based on control mode
        p3 - y position or height based on control mode
        dist - the distance for the camera

      • GViewPeasyCam

        public GViewPeasyCam(processing.core.PApplet theApplet,
                     float p0,
                     float p1,
                     float p2,
                     float p3,
                     processing.core.PVector lookAt,
                     float dist)
        Create a 3D view object controlled with PeasyCam on the main sketch surface.
        Parameters:
        theApplet - the main sketch
        p0 - x position based on control mode
        p1 - y position based on control mode
        p2 - x position or width based on control mode
        p3 - y position or height based on control mode
        lookAt - where the camera is looking at
        dist - the distance for the camera

    • Method Detail

      • mouseEvent

        public void mouseEvent(processing.event.MouseEvent event)
        Examine the mouse event created by Processing and see if it needs to be processed by this control.
        Do not call this method directly, it it called automatically by G4P at the appropriate time.
        Overrides:
        mouseEvent in class GAbstractControl

      • getPeasyCam

        public PeasyCam getPeasyCam()

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(float px,
                   float py)
        Move the control to the given position based on the mode.
        The position is not constrained to the screen area.
        The current control mode determines whether we move the corner or the center of the control to px,py
        Overrides:
        moveTo in class GAbstractControl
        Parameters:
        px - the horizontal position to move to
        py - the vertical position to move to

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(float px,
                   float py,
                   GControlMode mode)
        Move the control to the given position based on the mode.
        Unlike when dragged the position is not constrained to the screen area.
        The mode determines whether we move the corner or the center of the control to px,py
        Overrides:
        moveTo in class GAbstractControl
        Parameters:
        px - the horizontal position to move to
        py - the vertical position to move to
        mode - the control mode

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(float angle)
        Description copied from class: GAbstractControl
        Set the rotation to apply when displaying this control. The center of rotation is determined by the control_mode attribute.
        Overrides:
        setRotation in class GAbstractControl
        Parameters:
        angle - clockwise angle in radians

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(float angle,
                        GControlMode mode)
        Description copied from class: GAbstractControl
        Set the rotation to apply when displaying this control. The center of rotation is determined by the mode parameter parameter.
        Overrides:
        setRotation in class GAbstractControl
        Parameters:
        angle - clockwise angle in radians
        mode - PApplet.CORNER / CORNERS / CENTER

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enable)
        Description copied from class: GAbstractControl
        Enable or disable the ability of the control to generate mouse events.
        GTextField - it also controls key press events
        GPanel - controls whether the panel can be moved/collapsed/expanded
        Overrides:
        setEnabled in class GAbstractControl
        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable else false

      • setAlpha

        public void setAlpha(int alpha)
        Description copied from class: GAbstractControl
        Set the transparency of the control and make it unavailable to mouse and keyboard events if below the threshold. Child controls are ignored?
        Overrides:
        setAlpha in class GAbstractControl
        Parameters:
        alpha - value in the range 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque)

      • setAlpha

        public void setAlpha(int alpha,
                     boolean includeChildren)
        Description copied from class: GAbstractControl
        Set the transparency of the control and make it unavailable to mouse and keyboard events if below the threshold. Child controls are ignored?
        If required include the children and their children.
        Overrides:
        setAlpha in class GAbstractControl
        Parameters:
        alpha - value in the range 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque)
        includeChildren - if do do the same for all descendants
